ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, the only stat bonus is that it acts as a light source...
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, the only stat bonus is that it acts as a light source...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 9:01 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
>
>
> Could be it needs a range on it in order to be equipped in
> the range slot,
> therefore giving you the stat bonuses, if any?
>
> At
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 11:56 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
>
>
> How can you through a NO Drop (Forgot to point that out)...
>
> Slyde
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 10:38 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> >
> > QUESTION: The stats on the Evensong are 11/25 1HB Range 50
> > (Not so uber
> > compared to many Kunark and Velious Item). What the heck
> > does the Range 50
> > mean for this type of weapon?
> >
>
> It means you can throw it! Of course it is gone forever when
> you do :)
>
> Rokenn
